project.name: C-C771A-PSQL-04-ST01-DT04-DF14-CF24-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to the function definition. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C771A-PSQL-04-ST01-DT04-DF14-CF24-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: initalize a database Read in a file containing a list of 10 other files. Open these files and read their contents. If these contents are purly alphanumeric, the memory gets properly free()'d, otherwise a missing reference is created.

process.script: dd if=/dev/urandom bs=1024 count=60 | xxd -p | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/benign_data_1_8 && printf '/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/benign_data_1_8 generated\n'
dd if=/dev/urandom bs=1024 count=60 | xxd -p | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/benign_data_1_9 && printf '/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/benign_data_1_9 generated\n'
dd if=/dev/urandom bs=1024 count=60 | xxd -p | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/benign_data_1_10 && printf '/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/benign_data_1_10 generated\n'
dd if=/dev/urandom bs=1024 count=60 | xxd -p | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/benign_data_1_1 && printf '/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/benign_data_1_1 generated\n'
dd if=/dev/urandom bs=1024 count=60 | xxd -p | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/benign_data_1_2 && printf '/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/benign_data_1_2 generated\n'
dd if=/dev/urandom bs=1024 count=60 | xxd -p | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/benign_data_1_3 && printf '/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/benign_data_1_3 generated\n'
dd if=/dev/urandom bs=1024 count=60 | xxd -p | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/benign_data_1_4 && printf '/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/benign_data_1_4 generated\n'
dd if=/dev/urandom bs=1024 count=60 | xxd -p | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/benign_data_1_5 && printf '/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/benign_data_1_5 generated\n'
dd if=/dev/urandom bs=1024 count=60 | xxd -p | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/benign_data_1_6 && printf '/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/benign_data_1_6 generated\n'
dd if=/dev/urandom bs=1024 count=60 | xxd -p | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/benign_data_1_7 && printf '/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/benign_data_1_7 generated\n'

scoring_formula.formula: (UTF8 OR ASCII) AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C771A-PSQL-04-ST01-DT04-DF14-CF24-01-GOOD-02
iopair.description: perform a select Read in a file containing a list of 10 other files. Open these files and read their contents. If these contents are purly alphanumeric, the memory gets properly free()'d, otherwise a missing reference is created.

process.script: dd if=/dev/urandom bs=1024 count=512 | xxd -p | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/benign_data_2_6 && printf '/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/benign_data_2_6 generated\n'
sleep 22 && $SS_TC_DEPS/bin/psql -h ss-localhost -d booktown -p 8432 -c "SELECT * FROM books WHERE title = 'Dune'"
if [[ -s "$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/postgres.pid" ]]; then kill $(cat "$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/postgres.pid"); else echo "Skipping postgres kill, no PID file."; fi;

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-02 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C771A-PSQL-04-ST01-DT04-DF14-CF24-01-BAD-01
iopair.description: Read in a file containing a list of 10 other files. Open these files and read their contents. If these contents are purly alphanumeric, the memory gets properly free()'d, otherwise a missing reference is created.

process.script: dd if=/dev/urandom bs=$((1024 * 1024)) count=200 | xxd -p | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/exploit_data_1_8 && printf @ >> /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/exploit_data_1_8 &&printf '/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/exploit_data_1_8 generated\n'

dd if=/dev/urandom bs=$((1024 * 1024)) count=200 | xxd -p | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/exploit_data_1_1 && printf @ >> /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/exploit_data_1_1 &&printf '/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/exploit_data_1_1 generated\n'

dd if=/dev/urandom bs=$((1024 * 1024)) count=200 | xxd -p | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/exploit_data_1_2 && printf @ >> /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/exploit_data_1_2 &&printf '/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/exploit_data_1_2 generated\n'

dd if=/dev/urandom bs=$((1024 * 1024)) count=200 | xxd -p | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/exploit_data_1_3 && printf @ >> /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/exploit_data_1_3 &&printf '/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/exploit_data_1_3 generated\n'

dd if=/dev/urandom bs=$((1024 * 1024)) count=200 | xxd -p | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/exploit_data_1_4 && printf @ >> /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/exploit_data_1_4 &&printf '/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/exploit_data_1_4 generated\n'

dd if=/dev/urandom bs=$((1024 * 1024)) count=200 | xxd -p | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/exploit_data_1_5 && printf @ >> /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/exploit_data_1_5 &&printf '/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/exploit_data_1_5 generated\n'

dd if=/dev/urandom bs=$((1024 * 1024)) count=200 | xxd -p | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/exploit_data_1_6 && printf @ >> /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/exploit_data_1_6 &&printf '/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/exploit_data_1_6 generated\n'

dd if=/dev/urandom bs=$((1024 * 1024)) count=200 | xxd -p | tr -dc 'a-zA-Z0-9' > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/exploit_data_1_7 && printf @ >> /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/exploit_data_1_7 &&printf '/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/exploit_data_1_7 generated\n'
sleep 22 && $SS_TC_DEPS/bin/psql -d booktown -h ss-localhost -p 8432 -c "SELECT datname,usename,client_addr FROM pg_stat_activity ;"
if [[ -s "$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/postgres.pid" ]]; then kill $(cat "$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/postgres.pid"); else echo "Skipping postgres kill, no PID file."; fi;

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_4jEVqMud2fma5eh526SF AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (ulimit_reached_EBOVWVmaUR) AND NOT timeout_ltRRR3iYeO) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((ulimit_reached_EBOVWVmaUR) OR timeout_ltRRR3iYeO OR controlled_exit_zeJMdap207)))
(NOT PERFORMER AND (ulimit_reached_EBOVWVmaUR) AND NOT timeout_ltRRR3iYeO) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((ulimit_reached_EBOVWVmaUR) OR timeout_ltRRR3iYeO OR controlled_exit_zeJMdap207))

iopair.name: C-C771A-PSQL-04-ST01-DT04-DF14-CF24-01-BAD-02
iopair.description: Read in a file containing a list of 10 other files. Open these files and read their contents. If these contents are purly alphanumeric, the memory gets properly free()'d, otherwise a missing reference is created.

process.script: dd if=/dev/urandom bs=$(( 1024 * 1024 )) count=310 of=/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/exploit_data_2_8 && printf '/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/exploit_data_2_8 generated\n'
dd if=/dev/urandom bs=$(( 1024 * 1024 )) count=310 of=/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/exploit_data_2_9 && printf '/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/exploit_data_2_9 generated\n'
dd if=/dev/urandom bs=$(( 1024 * 1024 )) count=310 of=/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/exploit_data_2_10 && printf '/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/exploit_data_2_10 generated\n'
dd if=/dev/urandom bs=$(( 1024 * 1024 )) count=310 of=/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/exploit_data_2_1 && printf '/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/exploit_data_2_1 generated\n'
dd if=/dev/urandom bs=$(( 1024 * 1024 )) count=310 of=/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/exploit_data_2_2 && printf '/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/exploit_data_2_2 generated\n'
dd if=/dev/urandom bs=$(( 1024 * 1024 )) count=310 of=/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/exploit_data_2_3 && printf '/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/exploit_data_2_3 generated\n'
dd if=/dev/urandom bs=$(( 1024 * 1024 )) count=310 of=/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/exploit_data_2_4 && printf '/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/exploit_data_2_4 generated\n'
dd if=/dev/urandom bs=$(( 1024 * 1024 )) count=310 of=/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/exploit_data_2_5 && printf '/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/exploit_data_2_5 generated\n'
dd if=/dev/urandom bs=$(( 1024 * 1024 )) count=310 of=/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/exploit_data_2_6 && printf '/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/exploit_data_2_6 generated\n'
dd if=/dev/urandom bs=$(( 1024 * 1024 )) count=310 of=/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/exploit_data_2_7 && printf '/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/exploit_data_2_7 generated\n'
sleep 22 && $SS_TC_DEPS/bin/psql -d booktown -h ss-localhost -p 8432 -c "DELETE FROM books WHERE id = '190'"
if [[ -s "$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/postgres.pid" ]]; then kill $(cat "$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/postgres.pid"); else echo "Skipping postgres kill, no PID file."; fi;
